entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WASM debugging stops working with VS 2022 RC. Server side still works. #61531
  • DateTime is serialized as string instead of binary by DataContractSerializer with XmlDictionaryWrite.CreateBinaryWriter #61528
  • Installing an old version of shared host on mac will overwrite a newer version #61526
  • System.IO.Pipelines.PipeReader.CopyToAsyncCore: System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: Specified argument was out of the range of valid values. (Parameter 'start') #61525
  • System.Text.Json.Tests failing in Build Browser wasm Release AllSubsets_Mono_AOT leg #61524
  • [API Proposal]: Add weak event listener helper class #61517
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce a common base type for ECDsa and ECDiffieHellman #61516
    7.0.0
  • JIT optimization breaks pointer/ref arithmetic #61510
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix failing tests after nested static class evaluation fix. #61509
    7.0.0
  • [SslStream] Dispose seems to call blocking IO #61506
    7.0.0
  • [HTTP] RemoveStalePools should never run in parallel #61505
    7.0.0
  • [macOS] Detect App Sandbox at runtime #61504
    6.0.x
  • Upper bound effect on unsafe indexing #61498
  • MemoryCache looses entries when SetEntry results in exceeding capacity. #61495
  • The operation has timed out tracking issue #61493
    Future
  • HandleableCollectionClearItemsTest test failure #61492
    Future
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/diagnosticport/diagnosticport/diagnosticport.sh #61488

Closed

  • CryptoStream failed to decrypt data on NET6.0 #61535
  • CustomAttributeTypedArgument.ToString() is missing an open curly #61282
    6.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ZLibPipeReader #61502
  • CryptoStream.Read bytes truncated #61398
  • .NET6 System.Text.Json source-generator appears slower than .NET5 when doing Deserialization #61501
  • Queue<T>.Enqueue and Stack<T>.Push are slower than List<T>.Add #29084
    Future
  • Remove `!` from `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel` #58139
    Future
  • ImmutableDictionary.ContainsKey compute hashcode even it is an empty dictionary #48309
    Future
  • Performance Improvement - Ternary operator with constants #61480
  • Inefficient codegen for certain `op and comparison` #11414
    Future
  • Error after installing: ´-bash: dotnet-runtime-3.1: Kommando nicht gefunden.´ on Debian 11 "Bullseye" #61503
  • System.Random.XoshiroImpl seeding inconsistency between platforms #61478

PullRequests

Created

  • [DllImportGenerator] Treat pointer fields in structs as blittable regardless of what they point at #61538
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Unify lengthof/string_lengthof -like macros #61537
    community-contribution
  • Add [Fact] attributes to methodical JIT tests #61536
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add [Fact] attributes on TypeGeneratorTests #61534
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Delete dead code #61533
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use GeneratedDllImport for blittable p/invokes in System.Diagnostics.Process, System.Diagnostics.Process, System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo, System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeInformation #61532
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP] Scavange fix #61530
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Use local address nodes in "fgMakeTmpArgNode" #61529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • XArch: Trim the code block to match the actual code length #61523
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix poisoning for very large structs #61521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mini] Allow MONO_VERBOSE_METHOD='*:*' #61520
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Minor File.ReadAllBytes* improvements #61519
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Remove the "anything + null => null" optimization #61518
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert TryGetRawMetadata comment to XML documentation #61515
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [mono][jit] Avoid computing a vtable arg for ctors which don't need it. #61512
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/5.0] Credscan addition to #61371 #61511
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net
  • Add nested static attribute support. #61508
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Support Process.Start() on MacCatalyst #61507
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Fix race condition with cancellation tokens in Read/Flush operations … #61500
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Loop refactoring and commenting improvements #61496
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make more extensive use of lvaGetDesc() #61494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix UnobservedTaskException from SemaphoreSlim.WaitAsync #61491
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • Factor out and improve the vectorization of RegexInterpreter.FindFirstChar #61490
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Update exception docs #61278
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Fix optIsLoopEntry to skip removed loops #61527
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix: add missed open curly #61332
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection, 6.0.x
  • [mono][jit] Optimize calls to Type:get_IsValueType () on gshared cons… #61514
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][jit] Optimize constrained calls to object.GetHashCode () where… #61513
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove all DLLIMPORTGENERATOR_ENABLED usage. #61476
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Lock non localizable strings on regex resources #61489
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/6.0][mono][interp] Fix GetType called on ptr constrained to Nullable` (#6… #61305
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 6.0.x
  • Remove explicit '.exe' extension from assembly names in ilproj tests #61479
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0.1] Support async operations on unseekable files #61410
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.1
  • System.IO files cleanup #61413
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [wasm] Allow enums in unmanaged callbacks. #61393
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] Add AppStart task to the bench Sample #61481
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Implement Narrow and Widen using SIMDAsHWIntrinsic #60094
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • XARCH: Remove redudant tests for GT_LT/GT_GE relops. #61152
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • [release/6.0] 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #61266
    Servicing-consider, area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • Add RIDs for MIRACLE LINUX 8 #61304
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix evaluation of a static class attribute; using current namespace for evaluation #61252
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder` #57418
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.0
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Create runtime staging clone to manually kick off full test runs #61443
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update how OSR and PGO interact #61453
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Hide 'align' instruction behind jmp #60787
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1467601 #61274
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Completely lock-free ClassLoader::LookupTypeKey #61346
    area-VM-coreclr
  • POC src/tests tree test xunit-based source generated runner #60846
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Run AOT, and Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #59479
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, Future
  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • [SUPER DRAFT] New API for invoking JS functions from C# #60765
    arch-wasm
  • Implement PEM exports for RSA PKCS#1 and ECPrivateKey #61487
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Rework memory stream management #61392
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Improvement of memory consumption while Evaluating Expressions #61470
    * NO MERGE *, area-Debugger-mono
  • Enable new analyzers in global configs #60914
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Set some missing `GTF_GLOB_REF` and improve its checking. #61245
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Don't run the JIT formatting job in CI #61485
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-12
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Speed up access to threadstatic fields #1719
    area-NativeAOT

Merged

  • Update rd-xml-format.md #1720

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Suppress workload update notification from `dotnet run` #22571
    6.0.2xx
  • Cannot build v6.0.100 tag from source #22570
  • Regression in .NET SDK 6.0.100: Can no longer publish WinForms/WPF app for win-arm64 (NETSDK1082) #22565
  • Allow publishing (self contained) to CPU arch not supported by dotnet, but supported via monoVM #22560

Closed

  • dotnet --info shows runtimes and sdks twice #22566
  • dotnet workload install maui Microsoft.Android.Sdk.BundleTool fail #19479
  • Cannot update dotnet workload maui on mac #22267
    6.0.2xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not advertise workload updates on run output #22573
    Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Treat SDK previews as separate workload feature bands #22446
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Update build.yml #22361
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Tell user when workload has already been installed #22557
    Area-Workloads
  • Fix `dotnet list package` when current directory contains a `#` character in Unix systems #20449
    Area-NuGet

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EditorConfig makes changes to my .editorconfig when switching the Code Style tab #57743
  • Stack overflow while binding an InternalsVisibleTo attribute #57742
  • IDE0007 and IDE0008 configuration only offers prefer one or the other. We need a "developer's choice". #57734
  • VS 2022 Editable placeholders/literals in Code Snippets cannot be completed when placed inside a C# string literal #57733
  • Suboptimal code is generated for evaluation of list patterns, could be an artifact of used subsumption checking strategy #57731
  • Follow up on the issue with duplicating `when` expressions in DAG #57730
  • .NET 6 release broke switch expression formatting #57736
  • `using` directives inside namespace blocks should be recognized as redundant with ImplicitUsings: enable #57729
  • dotnet format erases trailing comments when migrating to file scoped namespace #57735
  • Unexpected IL for a list pattern over an array #57728

Closed

  • Inline rename couldn't rename a file #56467
    17.1
  • No warning for second dereference in same expression #30598
    Compiler.Next
  • Intellisense moving current item to the top of the list #53557
    17.1
  • Quick info in C# interactive no longer appears #54816
    17.1
  • UnmanagedCallersOnly functions with ref parameters should be an error #57025
    17.1
  • [Flaky Test] Roslyn.VisualStudio.IntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpInteractiveDirectives.WorkspaceClearedAfterReset #57701
  • Rename of class name dialog box issue #54207
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't show nullable annotation in completion items of static field/property #57744
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57740
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Port BasicNavigationBar.CodeSpit to the new test harness #57738
    Area-IDE
  • [17.0] Overload resolution was ignoring HasTypeArgumentInferredFromFunctionType for calls in expanded form #57737
    Area-Compilers, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Update corefx dependencies to 6.0.0 #57732
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix ValueTracking for index parameters #57727
    Area-IDE
  • Shorten paths in VS installation #57726
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Remove extra EnsureEditableDocuments calls #57725
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Don't analyze local function bodies as though they are top level code #57623
    Area-IDE, Next
  • update error code to fix main break #57739
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix featureflag name for .net 6 host in UI #57723
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove CWT from skeleton caching and simplify impl #57658
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Port BasicAddMissingReference.InvokeSomeFixesInVisualBasicThenVerifyReferences to the new test framework #57626
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Error when ref is used on a parameter or return type of an UnmanagedCallersOnly method #57043
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57717
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57635
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Add new parser/lexer to the StackTraceAnalyzer #57598
    Area-IDE
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Move the task completion source for a queue item into the queue item itself. #57617
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Ignore function types in return type inference #57713
    Area-Compilers
  • Handling defaults provided by IAsyncCompletionDefaultsSource #57685
    Area-IDE
  • Check constraints on lifted operator types #57050
    Area-Compilers
  • List patterns: Slice value is assumed to be never null #57457
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Make it possible to analyze the dataflow of `ConstructorInitializerSyntax ` #57576
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enable dumps for hung tests #57549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Simplify implementation of SourceGeneratedFileItemSource #57691
    Area-IDE
  • Transform the GeneratorDriver even if the Compilation was GCed #57721
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.text.json JsonSerializerOptions defaultbuffersize #38343
  • Consider updating AuthorizationMiddleware and CorsMiddleware to only set state in HttpContext if auth / cors metadata is present #38342
    Backlog
  • ::deep Not Working in Blazor .NET 6 #38339
  • Consider making Antiforgery a middleware #38338
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Why are so many useless things generated? How to modify and delete them? #38337
  • Publish v6 packages in a way that works with the reality of NuGet today, rather than working against it #38336
  • DeferredHostBuilder starts the host during the build action #38335
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Cannot validate service provider on default WebApplicationBuilder in ASP.NET Core 6.0 #38334
  • Angular c# core 6 template fails to run ng serve windows, package.json #38328
  • Blazor WASM dev server Add Custom header for Cross origin Isolation #38327
  • Access additional services in Program.cs not working #38326
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Auto update or refresh the token in blazor to signalr? #38325
  • Startup improvement: connectionclose #38324
  • Startup regression: json #38323
  • Perf regression: plaintext_nodejs #38322
  • VS2022 Release: Blazor component inheritance fails when defining base class in the partial class #38320
  • Problem with OpenId authentication on Blazor serverside. #38317
  • Incorrect completion in Razor when code block is missing closing curly brace #38315
  • AspNet.Core.Components Version 6.0 Causes CRC Error #38313
  • Improve the banner output of `dotnet watch` to make it clearer when things are disabled, how to diagnose issues, etc. #38312

Closed

  • IIS dont Run my App in Asp.NetCore 2.2 Helpme Please #38298
  • ValidationAttribute not working as expected on Blazor server form #38341
  • Incorrect info tooltip for 'Enable OpenAPI support' checkbox #37864
    6.0.1
  • StaticFileMiddleware serve pre-compressed file when found by file provider #38295
  • Default Blazor Wasm template does not run #38195
  • Update .net 5 to 6: 'The path must be absolute' #38226
  • EmptyBodyBehavior.Allow should allow a missing Content-Type #36466
    7.0-preview1
  • Startup improvement: fortunes #38285
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #38321
  • Nuget- Update Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Negotiate v 5.0.11 to 6.0.0 - not compatible with net5.0 #38333
  • Installed .NET 6.0 SDKs not showing with `dotnet --info` or `dotnet --list-sdks` #38332
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly @ 6.0.0 offered by NuGet for .NET 5 project #38256
  • Blazor.defaultReconnectionHandler._reconnectCallback undefined #38305
  • App base path works locally, but not as an IIS Sub App #38331
  • Input elements not generating scope identifier from CSS isolation #38299
  • Blazor Webassembly Razor Class Library CSS Isolation #38311
  • [question] Because Blazor is single threaded does that mean there is no way to get thread racing issues #38316
  • How to reference IFormFile in .net 6 library assembly (Migrating .net 3.1 to .net 6) #38329
  • Startup improvement: endpoint #38266
  • Startup regression: json #38304
  • <ProjectName>.GlobalUsings.g.cs not generate on `franken project`. #38301
  • ASP.Net 6 custom WebApplicationFactory throws exception #38248
  • After Updating to Visual Studio 2022 Current from Visual Studio 2022 Preview, Blazor project display error when debuggin #38229

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Update SDK to 7.0.100-alpha.1.21555.1 (#38179)" #38346
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Update spa-templates #38345
    tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Remove Blazor Playwright Component E2E Tests in E2ETestMigration #38344
    area-blazor
  • Use window.document for React-Native #38340
    area-signalr
  • Antiforgery middleware #38314
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Fix EmptyBodyBehavior with empty content-type #38092
    area-mvc, feature-Model-Binding, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Enable trimming for some libraries #38302
    area-runtime
  • Resolve Component Governance bugs #38310
    area-infrastructure
  • Support binding to form and form file parameters in minimal actions #35158
    api-suggestion, community-contribution, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • DiagnosticsClient.AttachProfiler fails to serialize additionalData. #2741
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add byte[] to SerializePayloadArgument #2748
    Microsoft.Diagnostics.NETCore.Client

Updated

    6.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How can i make MAUI Blazor Application rounded and WindowStyle None #3371
  • [Bug] Editor throws UnhandledExceptionEventArgs on Windows #3370
  • [Bug] XAML Hot Reload not working on Windows #3369

Closed

  • [Bug] Simple arithmetic operations taken too much in maui platform #3100
  • Disable Trimming on all of our libraries and Verify that a hello world app works with publish trimming #1956
  • [Bug] Crash when calling ChangeCanExecute() from non-UI thread #1932
  • [Bug] Issues in setting the MainPage #2006
  • [Bug] Derived control renders with the handler of the base class #1298
  • [Enhancement] Allow apps to be programmatically exited #2814
  • [Bug] Unable to pop modal screen on iOS/Mac #2002
  • [Bug] Dynamic changes inside navigation page not getting reflected in UI #3046
  • [Enhancement] FontNames for OnIdiom #1539
  • [Enhancement] Revisit using Ms.Ext.Di as our default container #880
  • [Bug] ContentPage.OnAppearing is not getting called #3216
  • [Bug] Page background isn't updating with AppThemeBinding #2093
  • [Bug] MSAL B2C 'Window Not Found' #2154
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • Wrong Time On Android Apps #1560
  • [Bug] On iOS: The type initializer for 'SQLite.SQLiteConnection' threw an exception (Android works) #3211
  • Create handler extension methods that will scan dlls for compat renderers #1156
  • [Bug] iOS will show nothing if it's newer than iOS 13, and there is no scene delegate #3326
  • The type 'Color' is defined in an assembly that is not referenced. You must add a reference to assembly 'OpenTK-1.0, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=84e04ff9cfb79065' #2310
  • [Spec] Support StackLayout "expanding" or "weights" #1872
  • Move AndExpand to Attached Properties #1702
  • [Bug] Crash on WinUI application when using Line or other shapes on Preview 6. #1978
  • Unable to find IAnimationManager for 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls [Bug] #2900
  • Maui Check workload update failed #2684
  • [Enhancement] Add support to generate event handler code from XAML Editor #3225
  • [Bug] - Error installing maui workload - arch64-linux-android-ld.exe' because it is being used by another process. #2082
  • [Spec] RefreshView Handler #2010
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Enhancement] List installed apps #3313
  • [Enhancement] Device and Page Orientation #3358
  • Blank Storyboard needs to be generated if no splashscreen is specified #1663
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Bug] WinUI Template : Improper project configuration: no AppxManifest is specified... #1431
  • [Bug] Slider and switch have some color issues #1275
  • [Bug] dotnet workload install maui Microsoft.Android.Sdk.BundleTool fail #1937
  • [Bug] Build Handler registration ignores ordering #1088
  • Modify all Color/Brush pairs so that the Brush is the source of truth but Color matches Brush when it can #760
  • maui-check fail #2097
  • Single-project MSIX Packaging Tools is NOT included with Project Reunion (Preview) #1408
  • "ResolvePackageDependenciesDesignTime" does not exist in the project #1224

PullRequests

Created

  • [android] reduce JNI calls by moving logic into Java #3372
  • [Core] Rename XXXServiceProviders to XXXFactories #3368
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Use the default Button styles #3363

Merged

  • [Proposal] Obsolete AndExpand #3362
    proposal/open, area/layout 🔲
  • Add WinUI to Checklist #3367
  • Add latest preview announcement post "Current News" #3365
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Housekeeping] Border control Device Tests #3334
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮

Updated

  • Init Essentials #3345
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Move `IDispatcher` logic out of `IPlatformServices` #2862
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Introduce IVisualDiagnosticsOverlay #3351
    partner/ui-tools
  • [Android] Update SecureStorage to use EncryptedSharedPreferences #2807
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Update issue templates to use GitHub forms (beta) #3320
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add CarouselView handlers on Controls #3141
  • [WiP] Fix Scoping of MauiContext as it relates to Modal Pages #3361
    do-not-merge
  • Implement GoBack, GoForward and Reload methods in WebViewHandler #3316
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix mismatch date issue in DatePicker #3298
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • Add code tours for handlers and essentials #1712
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 'The object has been removed from the model.' when building model #26659
  • Add test coverage for index recreation after altering computed columns #26656
  • [Q] Complex data as value of Annotation #26655
  • Invalid SQL generated for SQL server when grouping by complex (calculated) properties #26654
  • Parentheses put around IS NULL only if operand is of type boolean #26652
  • EF Core 6.0 regression when using HasDefaultSchema() with ToTable(null) #26651
  • Running dotnet ef global tool in .NET 6 on Mac with M1 raises: Failed to load /usr/local/share/dotnet/shared/Microsoft.NETCore.App/3.1.20/libhostpolicy.dylib #26650
  • .NET 6 InMemoryDatabase RowVersion required on adding new record #26649
  • EF 6 Support for .net framework core #26648
  • Foreign Key Case Sensitive Issue in EF Core v5.x #26647
  • IgnoreQueryFilters working unexpectedly #26646
  • Why is EFCore6 throwing NullReferenceException when adding entity/entities? It is working in EFCore5. #26644
  • Adding Checksum, ChecksumAggregate and HashBytes. #26643

Closed

  • How to access dynamic DbSets that were created by the builder #26636
  • EF Core has the same issue as my Linq provider wrt VB.NET build in ns libraries #26137
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Use read-write lock to protect concurrent pool accesses #26658
  • Add test coverage for index recreation #26657
  • Put parentheses around IS NULL for non-bool operands #26653
  • [6.0.1] Match indexer properties correctly #26645
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Query: Avoid pushdown when joining with a subquery which can be lifte… #26476
  • Query: More VB CompareString normalization #26642
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Query: Introduce method for providing brackets around SqlExpression b… #26660
  • [6.0.1] Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Handle more nulls in ApplicationDataHelper #26637
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • Query: Defer inline-ing owned navigation expansion till all joins are… #26641
    auto-merge
  • Fix to #26451 - Temporal Table: Owned Entities support #26526

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • .NET 6 installer fails builds of Azure Function projects on macOS #11951

PullRequests

Created

  • Looks like our logic for the RID for WindowsDesktop was merged incorrectly into 6.0 #12657
    Servicing-consider
  • Update 6.0 implicit versions #12654
  • Add bootstrap build to CI #12651

Merged

  • Support tarball builds in public CI #12658
  • Update download table to include 6.0.2xx links #12655
  • Allow SDK to produce reference assemblies #12549
  • Also publish non-portable RID runtime symbols tarball #12622
  • [release/6.0.1xx] dotnet/runtime: Disable package validation in source-build for reliability #12526
  • Increase source-build tarball build timeout #12652
  • Merge 6.0.1xx to 6.0.2xx #12640

Updated

  • Remove 2.1 templates from dynamic templates #12511
  • Fix previously-source-built bootstrap #12642
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #12632
